name: places/ChIJ8X9G-ZPzwokRR5dGRkdKdAQ

displayName.text: W Two Thirty Laundry Services LLC

adrFormatAddress: 215 W 230th St, Bronx, NY 10463-5201, USA

originalText.text: More money smaller machines, no where to seat.

text.text: More money smaller machines, no where to seat.

originalText.text: Think about it twice before doing your laundry here. You put your clothes in the dryer at a high temperature and by the time you turn around the employees put the temperature on a lower setting to make more money. It happened several times to myself and others that do laundry at this location. Rude employees on top of that and not wearing a face covering which is mandated by law due to COVID-19. They'll rob your money right under your nose.

text.text: Think about it twice before doing your laundry here. You put your clothes in the dryer at a high temperature and by the time you turn around the employees put the temperature on a lower setting to make more money. It happened several times to myself and others that do laundry at this location. Rude employees on top of that and not wearing a face covering which is mandated by law due to COVID-19. They'll rob your money right under your nose.

originalText.text: Opens early enough, although I prefer 24 hour laundromats. Next door to a Dunkin Donuts so I can enjoy a cup of coffee while I wash and dry my laundry. Only a few small washing machines (which will all be occupied if you are not early enough), and too many giant ones. The bill changer only takes $1 and $5 bills, not $10 bills, and the bill receptacle is too high for shorter people. Sometimes, it rejects real bills. Hopefully this will be fixed soon.

text.text: Opens early enough, although I prefer 24 hour laundromats. Next door to a Dunkin Donuts so I can enjoy a cup of coffee while I wash and dry my laundry. Only a few small washing machines (which will all be occupied if you are not early enough), and too many giant ones. The bill changer only takes $1 and $5 bills, not $10 bills, and the bill receptacle is too high for shorter people. Sometimes, it rejects real bills. Hopefully this will be fixed soon.

originalText.text: The machines are good,however the customer service STINKS. the employee with the blond hair act as if you owe her something, She has lousy customer service skills not to mention there were only  2 folding chairs for the patrons to sit.

text.text: The machines are good,however the customer service STINKS. the employee with the blond hair act as if you owe her something, She has lousy customer service skills not to mention there were only  2 folding chairs for the patrons to sit.

originalText.text: Dryers are often broken, but you don't know that until your put in lots of quarters, wait for your clothes to dry, but clothes are still wet. I told the girl, but she just walked away saying she doesn't understand English. Only ONE chair to sit, in the whole place, so you are forced to stand the 2-3 hours you're there. Bathroom is out of order constantly! Stopped going there. I've had ENOUGH!!
